explanation: [0-0] In an indoor setting, on the left, a man wearing a red and white baseball jacket, a white inner shirt, and blue jeans is sitting on a yellow sofa. He has a white round table in front of him with a round yellow placemat. On the placemat is a green toy turtle with red liquid on its shell. To the right of the table is a potted plant. The man in the baseball jacket is holding a hammer in his right hand, smiling, and looking down at the toy turtle on the table. On the right is a woman with long hair wearing a green top and white shoes. She is kneeling on the sofa, holding a mobile phone in her left hand, her mouth wide open, and her eyes wide open looking at the toy turtle on the table. The background is a wall with pink, light blue, and orange decorative patterns, and there is another green plant next to it.

[0-3] First, the man in the baseball jacket, baring his teeth, uses the hammer to repeatedly hit the toy turtle on the table. The woman in the green top kneels on the sofa, covers her mouth with her right hand, then slaps the man in the baseball jacket on the arm with her left hand, and stares at the toy turtle on the table with wide eyes. The scene changes to the man in the baseball jacket holding a real turtle in both hands, smiling forward, and kissing the turtle. The woman in green steps on the sofa, sits on the back of the sofa, and looks down at the mobile phone in her right hand. The man in the baseball jacket holds the turtle in both hands and turns sideways to look at the woman in green.
